subject: Art & Design
title: Decision Architecture: How Layout Shapes Choices
description: A 60-second lesson on Decision Architecture: How Layout Shapes Choices.

hook.text: A cafeteria put salads at eye level and cookies on the bottom shelf. Salad sales jumped 25%. The menu didn't change.

buildup.text: Decision architecture arranges choices so the desired option becomes the easiest to pick, without removing alternatives.

discovery.text: Key techniques: defaults (opt-in vs. opt-out), ordering (first items get picked more), and framing (loss vs. gain).

twist.text: Every design is a choice architecture. There's no neutral layout â€” even randomization is a decision about decisions.

climax.text: Organ donation rates: Germany (opt-in) has 12% donors. Austria (opt-out) has 99.98%. Same culture, different default.

punchline.text: You can't design without influencing choices. The only choice is how.

quiz.question: What is decision architecture in design?
options: Arranging choices so the preferred option becomes the easiest to select
Removing all options except the one the designer prefers
Making all choices equally difficult to find
